TextBlock.Text: CUMIN: Help me! There's an invisible wall and I can't get out!!
SACCO: ...It's true. I can't get close to you even though you're right in front of me.
MENTH: Cumin, calm down. How the hell did you get there?
MENTH: Cumin, calm down. How the hell did you get there?
CUMIN: I don't know! I was jumping up and down the wall around here and it came in!
SACCO: Maybe you should do that again?
CUMIN: Ah! ...I got out! Awesome, sis!!
MENTH: Hmm, maybe we should put this place on the back burner until we understand how it works.
